Subcommittee on Oceanography, Great Lakes and the Outer Continental Shelf

official_title: To require a report on improved fisheries enforcement capabilities.

summary.text: Requires the Under Secretary of Commerce for Oceans and Atmosphere to submit to specified congressional committees a report: (1) describing how current and planned satellite capabilities of the Federal Government can aid in the enforcement of Federal fisheries laws and international fisheries conservation programs; and (2) reviewing the feasibility of using foreign civil satellites for international vessel location and monitoring concerns.

titles.title: To require a report on improved fisheries enforcement capabilities.
